comments.raw_text:
Create a Google Survey for the team to see how useful our various artifacts are to determine if we need them moving forward (or can consolidate).

**List for survey:**

- PRDs
- Bugzilla Tickets / Bugzy
- Trello
- Tech Documentation
- Pre-release Checklist
- Figmas
- Meeting Recap Notes
- Experiment Design Documents
- Experiment Branch Description Documents
- Experimenter Tickets
comments.creator: gsuntop@getpocket.com
comments.author: gsuntop@getpocket.com
